data.message: Hey Facebook, I tried sending a DM to you guys, I'm having some issues. But it won't allow me to send the message.

replies.message: Hi Alex. This is a great place for questions. How can we help? -Jon
Why my Facebook is old version???
Hi Jon, my issue got taken care of thanks. Although, you should check into why it wouldn't allow me to DM you guys.

Love it how they don't answer. I don't have the market place but everyone else does
 And they don't even answer their DMs.

Hey, Colleen. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2lxIplz. -Rhea
I just sent a message as well. As of yesterday none of the buttons respond anymore. Cannot send friend requests or post or anything else involving a blue button..
Hi Katrin. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us using these steps: http://bit.ly/2kEGkor. -Jon
